contentencoded:
It's quiz time on Marketplace Tech. 250 minutes and 378,000: Can you guess what these two numbers mean?

For this week's game, we played with Technology Review editor in chief Jason Pontin at the Asgard Pub in Central Square, all with the encouragement from some of our listeners here in Boston.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, October 11, 2013
title: Guess what these numbers mean. This week's Silicon Tally
teaser: 250 minutes and 378,000: Can you guess what these two numbers mean?
